name: A Pony
effect: Passively grantsflightand increasesspeedto 1.5. Upon use, Isaac charges in the direction the pony is facing, givinginvulnerabilityduring the charge and dealing damage to enemies hit.

name: Anarchist Cookbook
effect: Spawns sixTroll Bombsaround theroom.

name: Best Friend
effect: Spawns a decoy Isaac that explodes after 5 seconds. Enemies will always target the decoy and ignore Isaac.

name: Bob's Rotten Head
effect: Isaac holds apoisonBombwhich can be thrown in the cardinal directions and explodes on impact.

name: Book of Revelations
effect: Increases the chance of aDevil Room/Angel Roomappearing while held. Upon use, gives oneSoul Heart, and replaces the boss of the current floor with aHarbingerif possible.

name: Book of Secrets
effect: Gives the effect ofTreasure Map,The Compass, orBlue Mapfor the duration of the currentfloor.If all effects are active,X-Ray Visionis provided for the floor instead. Highlights anyTinted Rocksand rocks withCrawl Spacein the room.

name: Book of Shadows
effect: Creates a protectiveshield, nullifying all types of damage in the current room for 10 seconds.

name: Box of Spiders
effect: Spawns 1-4Blue Spidersthat deal 2.5× Isaac's damage to enemies.Spawns 4-8Blue Spidersthat deal 2× Isaac's damage to enemies.

name: Converter
effect: Converts twoSoul HeartsorBlack Heartsinto one filledRed HeartContainer.Converts oneSoul HeartorBlack Heartinto one filledRed HeartContainer.

name: Crack the Sky
effect: Summons 5 beams of light in random locations on the ground, dealing large amounts of damage to any enemies that touch them.

name: Crystal Ball
effect: Reveals the map (except theSuper Secret RoomandUltra Secret Room) and drops aSoul Heartor randomcard/rune.While held, increases the chance of finding aPlanetarium.

name: D10
effect: Re-rolls allmonstersin theroom.Replaces allmonstersin theroomwith weaker monsters.

name: D100
effect: Combines the effects ofD4,The D6, andD20.Combines the effects ofD1,D4,The D6,D7,D8,D10,D12, andD20.

name: D20
effect: Rerolls allpickupsin the currentroom.

name: D4
effect: Rerolls all of Isaac'spassive items.

name: Dad's Key
effect: Opens all doors in the currentroomin almost all circumstances, including doors which require aKeyto open, entrances toSecret Rooms, and the door toMega Satan.

name: Dead Sea Scrolls
effect: Triggers the effect of a randomactivated itemfrom a list of possible options (not every activated item is included).

name: Deck of Cards
effect: Gives Isaac a randomcard.

name: Doctor's Remote
effect: Creates a crosshair on the ground that can be aimed with tear controls. A missile strikes the spot after 2 seconds, creating a heavy damage explosion.

name: Flush!
effect: Turns all non-bossmonstersin theroomintoPoop.Instantly kills poop-themed bosses. Floods the current room.

name: Guppy's Head
effect: Spawns 2-4 friendlyBlue Fliesthat damage enemies.

name: Head of Krampus
effect: Fires a powerfulBrimstonebeam in four cardinal directions, much likeKrampusshoots.Fires a powerfulBrimstonebeam in four cardinal directions, much likeKrampusshoots, with a 50% chance to rotate all beams around Isaac 90 degrees.

name: Isaac's Tears
effect: Fires 8 tears around Isaac, which retain thedamage,range,shot speed, and specialtear effectsof his tears. Each tear shot by Isaac increases item charge by one.Tears from this item have a +5 flat damage bonus.

name: Lemon Mishap
effect: Creates a tiny pool ofyellow creep, damaging enemies that cross it.

name: Mom's Bottle of Pills
effect: Gives Isaac a randompill.

name: Mom's Bra
effect: Petrifiesall enemies in the currentroomfor 4 seconds.

name: Mom's Pad
effect: Inflictsfearto all enemies in theroomfor 4 seconds.Spawns ablue fly.

name: Monster Manual
effect: Spawns afamiliarfrom a specific selection for the currentroom.Spawns afamiliarfrom a specific selection for the currentfloor.

name: Monstro's Tooth
effect: A friendlyMonstrojumps on a random enemy, dealing 120 area damage. Targets Isaac if used in aroomwithout enemies.

name: Mr. Boom
effect: Places aMr. MegaBombthat deals 110 damage.Places aMr. MegaBombthat deals 185 damage.

name: My Little Unicorn
effect: Givesinvulnerabilityand +0.28speedfor six seconds, removing the ability to shoot tears and replacing it with the ability to deal contact damage to enemies.

name: Prayer Card
effect: Gives Isaac anEternal Heart.

name: Satanic Bible
quote: Reusable evil... but at what cost?
effect: Gives oneBlack Heart.Replaces theboss room itemon the currentfloorwith aDevil Deal.

name: Scissors
effect: Turns Isaac's head into a stationaryfamiliarfor the currentroomwhich fires tears automatically.Isaac's body also shoots a controllable fountain of blood shots for the room.

name: Shoop da Whoop!
effect: Fires a laser from Isaac's mouth that deals twice Isaac'stear damage.

name: Spider Butt
effect: Deals 10 damage to all enemies in the room andslowsthem for 4 seconds.Enemies killed by Spider Butt spawnBlue Spiders.

name: Tammy's Head
effect: Shoots 10 tears in a circle around Isaac, which retain thedamage,range,shot speed, and specialeffects(such aspoison) of Isaac's tears. Tears from this item have a +25 flat damage bonus.

name: Telepathy For Dummies
effect: Giveshoming tearsfor the current room.Also gives +3range.

name: Teleport!
effect: Teleports Isaac to a randomroomon the currentfloor.

name: The Bean
effect: Isaac farts,poisoningany enemy in close range.

name: The Bible
effect: Grantsflightfor the currentroom. Instantly killsMom,Mom's Heart, andIt Liveswhen activated, but kills Isaac when used onSatan.

name: The Book of Belial
effect: +2damagefor the currentroom. Passively guarantees aDevil RoomorAngel Roomwill appear while held.+2damagefor the currentroom. Passively increases the chance of finding aDevil RoomorAngel Roomwhile held.

name: The Book of Sin
effect: Spawns a randomcoin,heart,bomb,key,battery,pillorcardnear Isaac.

name: The D6
effect: Re-rolls all items in the currentroominto other items, depending on the current room'sItem Pool.

name: The Gamekid
effect: Turns Isaac into aPac-Man-like creature for 6.5 seconds, grantinginvulnerability, inflictingfearon all enemies, and has a chance of replenishing aHalf Red Heartevery time an enemy is killed.

name: The Hourglass
effect: All enemies in theroomareslowedfor 8 seconds.

name: The Nail
effect: Gives oneSoul Heart. For the current room; +0.7damage, -0.18speed, Isaac breaksrocksand deals contact damage.Gives half aBlack Heart. For the current room; +2damage, -0.18speed, Isaac breaksrocksand deals contact damage.

name: The Necronomicon
effect: Deals 40 damage to every enemy in theroom.

name: The Pinking Shears
effect: Separates Isaac's head from his body for the currentroom, grantingflightand turning the body into afamiliarthat chases enemies.

name: The Poop
effect: Spawns a pile ofPoopwhere Isaac is standing andknocks backnearby enemies. May yieldpickupslike regular poop.

name: Undefined
effect: Teleports Isaac to theSecret Room,Super Secret Room,Treasure Room, orI AM ERROR.

name: Unicorn Stump
effect: Givesinvulnerabilityand increasedspeedfor six seconds, but removes the ability to shoot tears.

name: We Need To Go Deeper!
effect: Creates a trapdoor to go to the nextfloor.Once per floor, using it on tiles with special graphics will instead create aCrawl Space.

name: White Pony
effect: Passively grantsflightand increasesspeedto 1.5. Upon use, Isaac charges in the direction the pony is facing, givinginvulnerabilityduring the charge while also creating damaging beams of light.

name: Yum Heart
effect: Restores one fullRed Heart.

name: Box of Friends
effect: Duplicates all of Isaac'sfamiliarsfor the current room. If Isaac has no familiars, spawns aDemon Babyfor the room instead.

name: D12
effect: Re-rolls allRocksandMetal Blocksin the current room into other random obstacles.Re-rolls most types ofObstaclesin the current room into other random obstacles.

name: D7
effect: Restarts the currentroomand brings back allenemies, allowing more rewards to be acquired by completing the room.

name: D8
effect: Re-rolls Isaac'sdamage,tears,range, andspeed.

name: Friendly Ball
effect: Throwing the ball at amonsterinstantly kills and captures it. The captured enemy can later be released and will befriendly, fighting for Isaac and persisting between rooms.

name: Kidney Bean
effect: Isaac farts,charmingall nearby enemies.

name: Mega Bean
effect: Petrifiesall enemies in the current room for about 1.5 seconds,poisonsany enemies near Isaac, and sends a rock wave across the room in the direction Isaac is facing.

name: Mega Blast
effect: Isaac fires a giant laser for approximately 15 seconds. This laser deals massive damage, pushes Isaac backwards, and persists betweenroomsandfloors.

name: Mine Crafter
effect: Places aMovable TNTbarrel that can be pushed and used to destroy rocks or damage enemies. If used again in the same room while the previous TNT barrel is still intact, remotely detonates the TNT.

name: Mom's Box
effect: Increasesluckby 1 and doubles the effects oftrinketswhile held. When used, drops a random trinket on the ground.

name: Teleport 2.0
effect: Teleports Isaac to a room that has not been explored yet. Normal rooms are prioritized over special rooms, and common special rooms take priority over rarer ones.

name: Wooden Nickel
effect: Has a roughly 50% chance to drop apenny, nickel or dime, and a roughly 50% chance to do nothing.

name: Black Hole
effect: Throws a black hole on the ground which sucks in and damages enemies and destroys nearby obstacles.

name: Book of the Dead
effect: Creates afriendlyBony,Black Bony, or an orbital bone for each enemy killed in the current room.Creates afriendlyBony,Black Bony,Bone Fly,Revenant, or an orbital bone for each enemy killed in the current room.

name: Broken Shovel
effect: While held, causes Mom to continuously attempt to stomp on Isaac. Activating makes her stop for the current room or wave. One of two parts necessary to createMom's Shovel.

name: Clicker
effect: Transforms Isaac into a random character and removes the last item collected.

name: Compost
effect: Doubles Isaac'sBlue FliesandBlue Spiders, or spawns one if Isaac has none. Converts pickups in the current room into Blue Flies or Blue Spiders.

name: Coupon
effect: While held, guarantees one item in everyShopwill be on sale. On use, makes a random item in the current room free.

name: Crooked Penny
effect: Spawns a penny and has a 50% chance to double allitemsandpickupsin the room. If the effect fails, the items and pickups disappear.

name: D1
effect: Duplicates a random pickup in the room.The new pickup may be different than the original (i.e. a different card, etc).

name: Dataminer
effect: Displaces enemy sprites for the current room, randomly increases onestatand decreases another.

name: Delirious
effect: SpawnsDeliriumas a randomfriendlybossthat fights for Isaac.

name: Dull Razor
effect: Hurts Isaac without depleting health, activating any items that trigger upon taking damage.

name: Eden's Soul
effect: Spawns two item pedestals then is consumed. Begins with no charges.

name: Metronome
effect: Grants a random item effect for the current room.

name: Mom's Shovel
effect: Creates a trapdoor that leads to the next floor. UnlocksThe Forgottenwhen used on a mound of dirt that appears inDark Room.

name: Moving Box
effect: If the box is empty, picks up items and pickups in a room and stores them. If the box is not empty, places all stored items and pickups in the current room.Can carry up to 10 items or pickups at once.

name: Mr. ME!
effect: Summons a controllable ghost that can perform various tasks depending on what it targets.

name: Pause
effect: Freezes all enemies until a fire button is pressed.

name: Smelter
effect: Consumes Isaac's currently heldtrinketand applies its effect permanently.

name: Sprinkler
effect: Creates a stationary sprinkler for the current room that rotates and fires tears in 8 directions. The tears copy Isaac's stats and most tear effects.

name: Void
effect: Consumes all pedestal items in the room. Active items will have their effects added to Void, and passive items will grant random stat upgrades.

name: Abyss
effect: Destroys allitemsin the room and gives Isaac a unique locustfamiliarfor each item destroyed. Some items generate locusts with special effects.

name: Alabaster Box
effect: Spawns threeSoul Heartsand twoAngel Roomitems and is consumed. Starts with no charges, and can only be charged by picking up 6 Soul Hearts.

name: Book of Virtues
effect: Spawns a destroyable orbiting wispfamiliarthat fires tears and deals contact damage. Also acts as a passive item that causes other active items to spawn themed wisps.

name: Broken Glass Cannon
effect: Begins with no charges and turns intoGlass Cannonwhen used. Only acquired by taking damage while holding Glass Cannon.

name: Esau Jr.
effect: Swaps between the current character and Esau Jr., who has +2 flatdamageandflight. Characters have independent items and health. Dying as either character ends the run.

name: Eternal D6
effect: Rerolls all items in the room. Each item has a 25% chance to disappear instead.

name: Everything Jar
effect: Spawns certainpickupsbased on how many charges it has. If fully charged, instead has one of many unique effects.

name: Flip
effect: Item pedestals have a second uninteractable "ghostly" item behind them. Activating will flip the real and ghostly items around. If playing asTainted Lazarus, also flips between them andDead Tainted Lazarus.

name: Fortune Cookie
effect: Gives Isaac a fortune,Soul Heart,Card,Rune, ortrinket, similar to aFortune Telling Machine. Fortunes are much more likely to be given than anything else.

name: Free Lemonade
effect: Creates a large pool ofyellow creepbeneath Isaac.

name: Friend Finder
effect: Spawns a randomfriendlymonsterthat mimics Isaac's movements and attacks.

name: Gello
effect: Spawns a demonfamiliarfor the current room that's attached to Isaac and moves and fires in the direction Isaac shoots, using Isaac'sdamage,tears,range,shot speed, andspecialtear effects.

name: Jar of Wisps
effect: Spawns random wisps that shoot various tears, block shots, and deal contact damage. The number of wisps spawned increases every time the jar is used.

name: Keeper's Box
effect: Spawns a randomshopitemorpickupwhich can be bought for its normal price.

name: Larynx
effect: Isaac shouts, damaging and pushing away nearby enemies. The shout gets stronger the more charges the item has. Larynx gains 1 charge whenever Isaac takes damage, in addition to charging normally.

name: Lemegeton
effect: Spawns a wisp representing a random passive item, which orbits Isaac but can be destroyed. While the wisp is alive, Isaac gains that item's effects. Generation uses the current room's item pool 25% of the time, otherwise a random pool.

name: Magic Skin
effect: Consumes oneheart containeror twoSoul Heartsto spawn anitemand give Isaac abroken heart containerthat can never be filled. If Magic Skin isn't being held after being used, it is very likely to replace any future items.

name: Meat Cleaver
effect: Splits all enemies in the room into two smaller versions of themselves with much less health.

name: Mega Mush
effect: Gigantifies Isaac for 30 seconds, increasingdamageandrangewhile loweringtears, granting invulnerability, and allowing Isaac to crush enemies and obstacles he walks on. The effect persists between rooms.

name: Plum Flute
effect: Summons the bossBaby Plumto fight for Isaac in the current room.

name: Red Key
effect: Creates aRed Roomadjacent to a viable wall, indicated by the outline of a door. These rooms have a 10% chance to be aspecial room.

name: Spindown Dice
effect: Reduces the internal ID number of all items in the room by one, turning them into the item with that number.

name: Sulfur
effect: GrantsBrimstonefor the current room.

name: The Scooper
effect: SummonsThe Peeperfor the current room, which leaves a trail of redcreep.

name: Yuck Heart
effect: Gives Isaac aRotten Heart.
